text: The Nickelodeon Netherlands Kids' Choice Awards in the Netherlands were broadcast on Nickelodeon in the Netherlands and the Flanders region of Belgium in 2004, 2005 and 2007. ==Winners== ===2007=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! title: Nickelodeon Netherlands Kids' Choice Awards
